sense.name: watching
sense.commentary: OBSERVATION[+event] observance, notice - the act of observing or noticing or paying attention
sense.examples: He escaped the observation of the police. The principal's observation of the class lasted only ten minutes.

sense.name: making notes
sense.commentary: OBSERVATION[+event] the act of making and recording a measurement
sense.examples: Radio Observations of Comet Shoemaker-Levy have shown an increase in radio emissions.

sense.name: facts
sense.examples: He reported his observations to the mayor. Scientific observations while not proven are often accepted as fact.

sense.name: remark
sense.commentary: reflection, reflexion - a remark expressing careful consideration
sense.examples: Please keep your observations to yourself.
